review: You need to get the game like NOW...

This game fufills dreams.be a goat, a giraffe, a ostrich.perform demonic sacrifices, ram in to people for no apparent reason, and plenty more.You can fly, ram and climb up ladders in a glitchy motion.Go Goat Sim!

Definetly worth having a look at the ending is... well unexpected. The story gets very deep and what your are meant to do can sometimes be confusing.Serena is a great game, especially because its free.Its a short but entertaining game and will leave you wondering what will happen next.
